ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhh, that s solved it then. Where abouts in Sol A does the Reckless Efreeti spawn?? I know my way around quite well, wouldn t mind one of those swords to
ygData.messageBody:
Ahhh, that's solved it then. Where abouts in Sol A does the Reckless
Efreeti spawn?? I know my way around quite well, wouldn't mind one of those
swords to trade with.





Greg Gillan <GGillan@...> on 14/12/99 16:48:30

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...




From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Ah, okay. Talking about 2 different efreeti's here. First one is in Sol A
- The Reckless Efreeti, and drops the Obsidian Flamberge and Platinum
Armband. Pretty easy for a level 30 group to get to.
Second efreeti is the Efreeti Lord Djarn in Sol B. Drops the Golden
Efreeti
Boots and a +agi/HP ring. He's the one that's a royal pain to get to.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:56 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...


From: John_Senior@...

Hmm, I don't understand. How does this level 30 bard get to the efreeti
with a group of 6? He sounds all tooooo tough for a group of 30's.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
